thread.title: Terribly dirty room
thread.title_full: Terribly dirty room - Review of Citadines Trafalgar Square London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: pettyl2017
title: Terribly dirty room
text: I was very disappointed with my recent stays, on 1st stay, a disabled room was provided which I did not ask for and worst still, my prepaid second stay the following weekend, a terrible dirty room was given with lumps of dirt all over in the bedroom, bathroom and in the ventilation hood. The cabinet and utensils were all broken and needs upgrading for sure.
